Lunarpine picks his head up picking up a new scent, a powerful scent, an old
scent. something about it seemed odd. he was about to confront the stranger
when this wolf caught Strikers scent, he heard the two talking but decided
everything was under control. "A chamber should be open by now"he thought as
he walked back to his spot, maybe Shadow Wings done.

He walked inside and saw a blur in multiple tanks, he followed her scent
until he found hers, it was an old scent so even though he couldn't see her
he knew she was still inside. he continued along until he found the fresh
smell, the blur in front of him was so bad he almost hit his head on the
open door. the wolf transformed into his bot form and inched his way in,
pulling the doors closed behind him.

"Computer activate repair cycle, Lunarpine going offline, contact me when
repairs are completed." The last thing he heard was the hiss of the chamber
sealing and the hum of the machine as it began it's work.
